    Splice Machine Product-Specific Topics

    The following table lists the documentation topics that apply only to our database-as-a-service product; these pages are not relevant if you are using our on-premise product:

    Section Topic Comments
    Installation Guide All topics in this guide Installation is not required for our database service product.
    Administration Guide

    All topics in this guide

    		 Splice Machine handles administration of our database service product.
    Developer's Guide

    These topics are applicable for on-premise users only:

    • HCatalog
    • Map Reduce API
    • Working with HBase
    		These capabilities are not required or available in our database service product.
